nodes.text: The Dark Side Beckons was a roleplaying-game adventure in year four of the Living Force campaign. It was a the third adventure in the Jedi Code trilogy and was written by Ron Heintz and edited by Margaret Heintz and Jae Walker.
The heroes are sent by Jedi Master Lanius Qel-Bertuk to capture the former Jedi Zelice Sturm, who is running a smuggling ring on Tolea Biqua.
